title: Fuzzy and grainy display.
body:
Hey everyone,
So I have been facing some troubles on my new PC, the game works totally fine but the loading screen looks fuzzy after the champ select and when im in game the champ icon (vanilla or a skin icon) look grainy and pixelated, any help pls? It isnt crystal clear and crisp like I want it to.
Im sure it isnt a problem from my pc but just an issue in settings so please ill appreciate any help.
Here is my rig specs:
I7 7700 locked
Gtx 1060 6gb
16 gigs of ram
I can run it at 200+fps but my monitor is locked at 85 Hz so its 85 fps.
Thank you for your time.

replies.body: This could be caused by a few things like driver issues or just bad game files.  Run through our [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to help rule out some possibilities.  Just in case, you can also download [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) and perform a repatch in case there are some bad game files.

Wow I didnt expect a red reply,
I appreciate your response but it isnt an fps problem (running the game very smoothly) and no stuttering, just having fuzzy pixelated champ icons on the HUD and in the loading screen it isnt as smooth, do I try repatching it with the hextech tool or do I need to fix anything with my nvidia control panel to make it smoother?
I run it with full screen and 1920x1080 resolution, will switching to borderless help?
Ty and im sry about asking too much questions :/

Sorry for the confusion, to clarify the fps guide helps tune up your settings and any stress on your PC like bad drivers.  Your symptoms sound like issues the guide can resolve, unless there are potential hardware issues or something else causing it.    Has that or the HRT helped at all?

I did upgrade my graphics card and tried some things from the fps guide I also repatched but still the grainy champ icon on the HUD :(
I red some posts about it, they all tell to disable the scaling with high dpi displays, so I tried it but still no result :/

Hey, no worries, grab the logs provided by HRT and submit them in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) or support@riotgames.com.  Our tech team can work with you directly and get this figured out!
Oh alright! Ill send them the logs soon, thanks for your help Porocles^^

Oh my bad, ill update my graphics card to the newest version (currently version 3.76) and see if it works, I ran a bad driver test and theres no bad drivers detected everything is connected and working well, ill report to you after 2 days because im away from home and ill be back on sunday :/
Thanks for following up with me through all this :)
Wow I just realized I posted that on NA server omg xD (wasnt finding the post on EUNE)
